'''''Amateurs Hammer Nails Into Hooks''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to catch their first fish.

==Trivia==
* This name is directly taken from a line in the poem {{Lang|"River Village"|zh=江村|zh_rm=Jiāngcūn}} by {{w|Du Fu}} which describes serene life.<ref>Google Books: [https://books.google.ca/books?id=-_cFEAAAQBAJ&pg=PA136 Drifting among Rivers and Lakes: Southern Song Dynasty Poetry and the Problem of Literary History] (pg. 136)</ref>
